mapper.select: select name, image, description, category, use_count, choice_ratio, price, option_type from options join trims_options on trims_options.option_id = options.id where trims_options.trim_id = #{trimId} and options.id = #{optionId}
select hashtag.name from options join options_hashtag on options.id = options_hashtag.option_id join hashtag on hashtag.id = options_hashtag.hashtag_id where options.id = #{optionId}
